text:
- Dropbox allows you to
store, organize, share,

and collaborate on your most
important digital content.

Dropbox has built its
hybrid cloud leveraging AWS.
We have been leveraging them

for distributed data
processing, cloud bursting,

disaster recovery, and also
international expansion.
We've also been leveraging

some of the AI and ML innovation
such as Amazon SageMaker
and also been leveraging it
for a lot of international expansion.
Specifically, we are planning
on leveraging additional capabilities

on the analytics data
platform that is gonna help us

drive more insights that
is gonna allow the business
to scale and drive more revenue.
Also in the AI in ML space,
it's actually gonna help us design

and build the world's
first smart workspace.

AWS is enabling better
overall user experience,

driving more product features
to the market much faster,

allowing us to scale
and meet our customers'

ever-growing needs,
and optimize our costs.
